snippet: A Tokyo court ruled Friday that Samsung’s mobile products did not infringe on Apple’s patents.
abstract: Japanese court rejects patent claims made by Apple against Samsung, a victory for the company after its crushing defeat in the United States and a reminder of the global scope of the patent war between the two technology giants; two companies remain neck-and-neck in legal disputes in almost a dozen countries.

byline.original: By HIROKO TABUCHI and NICK WINGFIELD
byline.contributor: Hiroko Tabuchi reported from Tokyo and Nick Wingfield from Seattle.

lead_paragraph: A Tokyo court ruled Friday that Samsung’s mobile products did not infringe on Apple’s patents.

headline.seo: Samsung Wins a Patent Case Over Apple in Japan
headline.main: Tokyo Court Hands Win to Samsung Over Apple
headline.print_headline: Tokyo Court Hands Win To Samsung Over Apple
